author: zhili1208
body:
From https://github.com/NuGet/Home/issues/5456

Repro steps:
1. Get NuGet package microsoft.entityframeworkcore.tools from https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools/
2.Open NuGet Powershell Console, import "EntityFrameworkCore.psd1" from the package
the module file imported all functions
3. invoke "update-database" function, got "update-database is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program. Check the spelling of the name, or if a path was included, verify that the path is correct and try again."

Since Nuget Powershell console just pass everything to powershell host, it looks like not a nuget issue.
I can't repro this issue but @jonkerr hit this on his machine. Could you take look? 

Log:
Loading module from path 'C:\Users\[user]\.nuget\packages\microsoft.entityframeworkcore.tools\1.1.1\tools\EntityFrameworkCore.psd1'.
Loading module from path 'C:\Users\[user]\.nuget\packages\microsoft.entityframeworkcore.tools\1.1.1\tools\EntityFrameworkCore.psm1'.

The names of some imported commands from the module 'EntityFrameworkCore' include unapproved verbs that might make them less discoverable. To find the commands with unapproved verbs, run the Import-Module command again with the Verbose parameter. For a list of approved verbs, type Get-Verb.
The 'Drop-Database' command in the EntityFrameworkCore' module was imported, but because its name does not include an approved verb, it might be difficult to find. For a list of approved verbs, type Get-Verb.
Importing function 'Drop-Database'.
Importing function 'Enable-Migrations'.
Importing function 'Remove-Migration'.
The 'Scaffold-DbContext' command in the EntityFrameworkCore' module was imported, but because its name does not include an approved verb, it might be difficult to find. For a list of approved verbs, type Get-Verb.

The 'Script-Migration' command in the EntityFrameworkCore' module was imported, but because its name does not include an approved verb, it might be difficult to find. For a list of approved verbs, type Get-Verb.

Importing function 'Update-Database'.

```
PM> Update-Database
Update-Database : The term 'Update-Database' is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program. Check the spelling of the name, or if a path was included, verify that the path is correct and try again.
At line:1 char:1
+ Update-Database
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : ObjectNotFound: (Update-Database:String) [], CommandNotFoundException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : CommandNotFoundException
```
title: Imported the function but still got "is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program. Check the spelling of the name, or if a path was included, verify that the path is correct and try again."
